column1: '''''gabil''''' is a [[Khuzdul]] element only appearing the compound names ''[[Gabilgathol]]'' and ''[[Gabilān]]''. As ''Gabilān'' is glossed as "great river",<ref name=WJ>{{WJ
column2: Maeglin}}, p. 336</ref>  and ''Gabilgathol'' is said to be have been translated into ''[[Belegost]]'' ("Great Fortress"),<ref>{{HM
column3: LR}}, p. 274</ref> one can, as [[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested, infer that ''Gabil'' probably means "great".<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/khuzdul.htm Khuzdul: the secret tongue of the Dwarves]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 22 July 2011)</ref>
